Package RRPSS

Class MenuItem

Object
MenuItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlaCarte, PromoSet
public abstract class MenuItem extends Object
MenuItem is the abstract base class of all forms of menu items in the menu. The item to be added into the menu list must first extend this class.
Since:
2021-11-06
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chua Chong Yih

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem​(String name, String description, double price)
      Creates a new menu item with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the menu item.
      description - The description of the menu item.
      price - The price of the menu item.

  • Method Details

    • displayItem

      public abstract void displayItem()
      Displays all menu items in the menu array list.

    • displayItemDescription

      public abstract void displayItemDescription()
      Description of menu items to be printed

    • updateMenu

      public abstract String updateMenu()
      Format of the String to update to the text file. Constructor must be set up to accomodate this String format.
      Returns:
      String of all menu items.

    • updateMenuDescription

      public abstract String updateMenuDescription()
      Format of the order of menu items in the text file for readability.
      Returns:
      String of all menu descriptions in the menu item.

    • compareValue

      public String compareValue()
      Parameter to sort the list of menu items by. Default sorts by menu item name.
      Returns:
      default comparison value.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the menu item.
      Returns:
      the name of this menu item.

    • setName

      public void setName​(String name)
      Changes the name of the menu item.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name of this menu item.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the menu item.
      Returns:
      the description of this menu item.

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription​(String description)
      Changes the description of the menu item.
      Parameters:
      description - the new description of this menu item.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Gets the price of the menu item.
      Returns:
      the price of this menu item.

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice​(double price)
      Changes the price of the menu item.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price of this menu item.
